page.title: 06UNEMPLOYMENT IN BREICH AREA
page.content: The{biggest problem} in this area is unemployment. In the households of our class of 39 pupils there are 25 unemployed persons. What are the reasons for this? Well in the last year West Lothian's two biggest employers, British Leyland at Bathgate and the N.C.B. at Polkemmet colliery, have closed with the{loss of {almost 6ooo jobs.}In addition many smaller firms have either gone out of business or moved away. What is being done? In this area the Manpower Services Commission has set up Various Workshop Schemes in Stoneyburn and there are two community schemes known by their initials, B.E.A.G. and C.O.W.L. Community Education also tries to help by running courses and activities for the area's unemployed, especially the young.
